attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC is an outdated entity, it's had it's day and fails to compete with the growing number of cable/satellite channels.
The licence fee has once again grown to an unacceptable amount especially considering the poor standard of programming we are given by the BBC.

It is time this aging organisation was closed down.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
